name: Donatiya
description:
Moloch the Soul Affineur sends young Donatiya to reclaim escaped souls and save the fiery realm of Gehanna. A short and sweet puzzle platformer. 

Controls:
WASD - Move
(Space) - Jump
RMB - Throw Object

Huntrox - Programmer
Cholfy - Programmer / BG Artist
Spider - 2D Artist
Swag - Swag
Lord Neptune - Music
Eamon Kane - Writing / Voice Acting
Ivy - Programmer
